I would also include a small animal population, such as birds or insects, to help pollinate and pest control.

Explore the world: As the last person on Earth, I would have the unique opportunity to explore the world without any distractions or constraints. I would travel to every corner of the globe, discovering new landscapes, cultures, and histories. I would visit famous landmarks, museums, and cultural institutions, and learn as much as I could about the world's diverse peoples and civilizations.

I would use my knowledge of science and engineering to create innovative solutions to the challenges facing our planet, such as climate change, resource depletion, and sustainable energy. I would also use my time to explore the possibilities of artificial intelligence, robotics, and biotechnology.
